form.Label: Чеклисты
form.Name: select
form.SQLselect:
SELECT ecl.ListID, ecl.ListName, GROUP_CONCAT(ecli.ActionName ORDER BY ecli.ItemID ASC SEPARATOR '
') AS ChecklistItems FROM employee_checklist ecl LEFT JOIN employee_checklist_item ecli ON ecli.ListID = ecl.ListID GROUP BY ecl.ListID ORDER BY ecl.ListName
